page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content:
The major planned housing development in this area is at the USAF Air Base, RAF Woodbridge. Here there are some 257 houses in which servicemen and their families live. There is also single-person accommodation for about 400 Air Force personnel, 100-odd of whom are women. Both types of accom- modation on the Base have been purpose-planned and built.
There is little other housing in this rural area (less than 20 houses), but what exists is generally scattered and consists of older houses occupied by Forestry employees and tenants, local farm workers, or Officers working at the Hollesley Bay Borstal Colony.
